qas.question: What was the largest armory in the world?
What is Kingsbridge Armory being turned into?
Where is a La Quinta being built in the Bronx?
How much development space would a Concourse Yard platform provide?
How much would a Concourse Yard platform cost?

context: Several boutique and chain hotels have opened in recent years in the South Bronx; in addition, a La Quinta Inn that has been proposed for <a2_0>the Mott Haven waterfront<a2_0/>. The <a0_0>Kingsbridge Armory<a0_0/>, often cited as the largest armory in the world, is scheduled for redevelopment as the <a1_0>Kingsbridge National Ice Center<a1_0/>. Under consideration for future development is the construction of a platform over the New York City Subway's Concourse Yard adjacent to Lehman College. The construction would permit approximately <a3_0>2,000,000 square feet<a3_0/> (190,000 m2) of development and would cost <a4_0>US$350–500 million<a4_0/>.
